snippet: The decision of the Doner principals to cast their lot with a holding company comes after several tumultuous years that included the loss of the agency’s largest account, Mazda North America.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; advertising agency Doner is ending its go-it-alone status after 75 years by selling a minority interest to agency holding group MDC Partners; decision comes after several tumultuous years for Doner, one of the largest independent agencies.
lead_paragraph: The decision of the Doner principals to cast their lot with a holding company comes after several tumultuous years that included the loss of the agency’s largest account, Mazda North America.

headline.seo: Doner, After Tumultuous Times, Sells a Stake to MDC
headline.main: After Time of Tumult, Doner Sells a Stake to MDC
